name: Mini Design System (Open Source) for Mobile Style & Component
description:
This Mini Design System was created as a little reference or idea for those of you who are also looking for references about Design System, of course especially as a learning for me personally. This Design System is of course still far from perfect, hopefully from the example I have made, you can make a design system much better than this.


Hopefully this Mini Design System project file will continue to grow with the latest updates. For those of you who want to contribute, you can email me at anugerahdaru@gmail.com
